title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, objectives, timeline, and resource requirements. Create a project plan and establish communication channels with stakeholders.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct user research, interviews, and surveys to understand the target audience and their needs. Define functional and non-functional requirements for the ThoughtStreamNovelizer system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the brain-computer interface, data processing pipeline, narrative generation components, and associated infrastructure. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects.

title: Brain-Computer Interface Development
description: Develop the hardware and software components for capturing and interpreting brain signals.

title: Data Processing Pipeline
description: Build a pipeline for processing and transforming raw brain data into a format suitable for narrative generation.

title: Narrative Generation Engine
description: Develop an AI-powered engine capable of generating coherent and engaging narratives from the processed brain data.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design an intuitive and user-friendly interface for interacting with the ThoughtStreamNovelizer system. The interface should allow users to easily initiate and control the brain-computer interface, as well as view and manage the generated narrative content.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the user interface based on the approved design, integrating with the backend components.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute tests to ensure the system meets functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Assess potential security and privacy risks associated with the system and implement appropriate measures to mitigate them.

title: Deployment and Infrastructure
description: Set up the necessary infrastructure and environments for deploying and running the ThoughtStreamNovelizer system.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for the ThoughtStreamNovelizer system.
